text:
Q: Sum of arrays in a snowflake column A:

VECTOR_SUM:

Computes the element-wise sum of vectors in an aggregate. Returns a vector where each element is the sum of the corresponding elements across all input vectors.

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE tab (grp STRING,vec VECTOR(INT, 4));

INSERT INTO tab(grp, vec)
SELECT 'A', [1,2,3,4]::VECTOR(INT, 4) UNION ALL
SELECT 'A', [1,2,3,4]::VECTOR(INT, 4) UNION ALL
SELECT 'B', [1,1,0,0]::VECTOR(INT, 4) UNION ALL
SELECT 'B', [0,0,1,1]::VECTOR(INT, 4);

SELECT grp, VECTOR_SUM(vec)
FROM tab
GROUP BY grp;

Q: Designing PhilHealth (Philippine Health Insurance) integration before official SOAP APIs are available (.NET) A:

Talk with domain experts. If you have a good understanding of the domain, workflows and use cases, then the architecture should be fairly straightforward.

Random people on the internet are generally not experts in your domain, so I'm not sure what type of guidance you hope to get.

Q: Previous preparation error: The developer disk image could not be mounted on this device A: 
sudo installer -pkg /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Resources/Packages/XcodeSystemResources.pkg -target /

None of the earlier responses worked for me, and I did my own research, this one worked.

Q: visibilitychange event is not triggered when switching program/window with ALT+TAB or clicking in taskbar A:

If none of the solutions here worked for you, here's what finally solved it for me: I discovered that "Emulate a focused page" was enabled in Chrome DevTools few months ago and forgot about it. I was using DevTools to debug the visibilitychange event, but DevTools itself was preventing the event from firing by emulating constant focus. Two hours of my life gone.

you can find how to disable this option here

Q: Transfer pointer from dll (c/c++) to python A:

you should try dll.your_function.restype = ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_double)
